item.title: End ID-48 East at Bus. US-26
item.description: End ID-48 East at Bus. US-26 in Ririe.

item.title: ID-48 East at Bus. US-20
item.description: ID-48 East at Bus. US-20 in Rigby. Turn right on Bus. US-20 West to Idaho Falls and Pocatello.

item.title: ID-48 East at Bus. US-20
item.description: ID-48 East at Bus. US-20 (State St.) in Rigby. Turn right on Bus. US-20 for Idaho Falls and left on Bus. US-20 for Rexburg. Continue straight on ID-48 for Ririe.

item.title: ID-48 East Approaching Bus. US-20 (State St.)
item.description: ID-48 East Approaching Bus. US-20 (State St.) in Rigby.

item.title: ID-48 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-48 east. Distance to Rigby and Ririe.

item.title: ID-48 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-48 east. Distance to Menan and Rigby.

item.title: ID-48 - Roberts
item.description: ID-48 (N 2880 E) at E 650 N in Roberts. Turn right on E 650 N to continue east on ID-48 towards Menan and Rigby.

item.title: Begin ID-48 East at I-15 North
item.description: Begin ID-48 East at I-15 North in Roberts. Turn left for I-15 north to Butte (Montana); use ID-48 east for Roberts and Rigby.

item.title: I-15 South (Exit 135) at ID-48
item.description: I-15 South (Exit 135) at ID-48 in Roberts. Turn left for Roberts and Rigby; left for Berrett Road.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 135
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 135 - ID-48 South/Roberts/Rigby

item.title: US-26 East at BL-26/ID-48
item.description: US-26 east at BL-26/ID-48 - the eastern end of the Ririe business loop.

item.title: US-26 East at BL US-26 and ID-48
item.description: US-26 east approaching BL-26 and ID-48. This is the eastern end of the Ririe business loop.
